description: Returns a list of all OpsItem events in the current Amazon Web Services Region and Amazon Web Services account. You can limit the results to events associated with specific OpsItems by specifying a filter.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: One or more OpsItem filters. Use a filter to return a more specific list of results. (dict) --- Describes a filter for a specific list of OpsItem events. You can filter event information by using tags. You specify tags by using a key-value pair mapping. The name of the filter key. Currently, the only supported value is OpsItemId. The values for the filter, consisting of one or more OpsItem IDs. (string) --- The operator used by the filter call. Currently, the only supported value is Equal.

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: The name of the filter key. Currently, the only supported value is OpsItemId.

nested_params.name: Values
nested_params.description: The values for the filter, consisting of one or more OpsItem IDs.

nested_params.name: Operator
nested_params.description: The operator used by the filter call. Currently, the only supported value is Equal.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token for the next set of items to return. Use this token to get the next set of results.

nested_items.name: Summaries
nested_items.description: A list of event information for the specified OpsItems.

nested_items.name: EventId
nested_items.description: The ID of the OpsItem event.

nested_items.name: Source
nested_items.description: The source of the OpsItem event.

nested_items.name: DetailType
nested_items.description: The type of information provided as a detail.

nested_items.name: Detail
nested_items.description: Specific information about the OpsItem event.

nested_items.name: CreatedBy
nested_items.description: Information about the user or resource that created the OpsItem event.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM entity that created the OpsItem event.

nested_items.name: CreatedTime
nested_items.description: The date and time the OpsItem event was created.
